summary: In 1943, in the wake of the Allied amphibious landing on the Japanese-held Bougainville Island, four Marines are sent to scout the location of Japanese minefields.
cast: Tony Curtis|Frank Lovejoy|Mary Murphy|Eduard Franz|Skip Homeier|John Doucette|Alan Wells|Akira Fukunaga|Dan Aoki|Steamboat Mokuahi
keywords: amphibious landing|u.s. marine|amphibious vehicle|semiautomatic rifle|tommy gun
